title: Development of Adoptive immunotherapy of EBV-associated Malignancies by Retroviral LMP2-TCR Gene Transfer
abstractText: Epstein Barr Virus (EBV) can cause several different types of cancer. There are currently no treatments available for some of these cancers. Our proposal is to take blood cells from patients with EBV-associated cancer and turn them into killer cells directed towards the cancer cells and then inject back into the patient. These killer cells will then be able to destroy the cancer cells and cure the patient.
